short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate Christmas with a festive anime twist! Enjoy a lively scene of anime girls enjoying the holiday season on your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the holiday season with the elegance of the Decorated Christmas Tree Live Wallpaper. This Chrome extension transforms your new tabs into a festive wonderland, featuring a beautifully adorned Christmas tree with sparkling lights, ornaments, and holiday cheer. Bring the spirit of Christmas to your browsing experience!

Features:
🎄 Gorgeous live wallpaper showcasing a decorated Christmas tree.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display to keep your holiday schedule on track.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts to your favorite websites.
Enjoy the magic of Christmas every time you open your browser and let this festive extension brighten your day.

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
